Text: On the RIGHT side of the EVA Kit, locate the PANEL ACCESS KEY.
Caution: The keys are on a tension-spring cable.

Text: Use the PANEL ACCESS KEY to unlock the PANEL ACCESS DOOR LOCKS.
Holograms: panelAccessDoor key part highlight, arrow showing direction of key rotation

Text: Carefully return keys to the side of the EVA kit.
Holograms: panelKeyPart highlight, arrow pointing key part

Text: Insert your fingers in the CENTER OPENING and secure the PANEL ACCESS DOOR in an OPEN position.
Holograms: centerOpening highlight, arrow showing opening direction

Text: On your belt, use the BLUE CARABINEER to securely tether to the TETHER CABLE inside the STORAGE.
Caution: Notice the TETHER CABLE is adjustable

Text: Locate the E-STOP button and gently press down to temporarily disable the alarm
Holograms: E-Stop button highlight, arrow pointing downwards

Text: Locate the FUSIBLE DISCONNECT box.
Tether the BLUE CARABINEER to the TETHER CABLE.
Remove the BLUE CARABINEER from the FUSIBLE DISCONNECT box
Transfer the BLUE CARBINEER to STORAGE
Open the FUSIBLE DISCONNECT box and secure the lid in the open position
Caution: Pull the locking tab toward STORAGE with the thumb

Text: Locate the BLACK DISCONNECT
Tether it to the TETHER CABLE
Remove the DISCONNECT
Caution: Pull up with the index and middle fingers while pushing down on the FUSE ACCESS PANEL with the thumb

Text: Place the DISCONNECT in the STORAGE
Tether the FUSE ACCESS PANEL to the TETHER CABLE
Holograms: Fuse access panel highlight, arrow pointing tether cable

Text: Remove the FUSE ACCESS PANEL by pulling straight up
Holograms: Fuse access panel highlight, arrow pointing upwards

Text: Place the FUSE ACCESS PANEL into STORAGE
Tether the ALARM FUSE to the TETHER CABLE
Holograms: Alarm fuse highlight, arrow pointing tether cable

Text: In Storage, locate the BLUE FUSE PULLER
Use the BLUE FUSE PULLER to remove ONLY the ALARM FUSE
Caution: Rock the ALARM FUSE with the FUSE PULLER when pulling up

Text: Return the ALARM FUSE and the FUSE PULLER to STORAGE
In STORAGE, locate the FUSE ACCESS PANEL
Reinstall it into the FUSIBLE DISCONNECT box
Holograms: Highlight disconnect box, arrow pointing downwards

Text: Remove the FUSE ACCESS PANEL tether from the TETHER CABLE and stow inside
Warning: All tethers are under spring tension and can retract quickly

Text: In STORAGE, locate the DISCONNECT
Reinstall it into the FUSIBLE DISCONNECT box
Caution: The DISCONNECT must read ?ON? in the upper right corner to restore conductivity
Holograms: Highlight disconnect box, arrow pointing downwards

Text: Remove the DISCONNECT tether from the TETHER CABLE
Holograms: Highlight disconnect tether or arrow pointing

Text: Close the FUSIBLE DISCONNECT box cover
In STORAGE, use the BLUE CARABINEER to clip and lock the FUSIBLE DISCONNECT box cover.
Remove the BLUE CARABINEER?s tether from the TETHER CABLE
Holograms: Arrow pointing tether cable or highlight tether
